field.description:
Dear Members,
Northshore malayali association will be celebrating our Christmas and New year programme on 5th of January 2019 at Takapuna War Memorial Hall. The programme will commence at 5pm. We are planning to hold a night with entertainment and fun. We request your complete co-operation to make this a success. Lets all celebrate this Xmas and New year with a joyful spirit.
We are expecting enrollments for different entertainment items, so interested individuals please come forward and contact us. We have arranged a committee for the above and the contact numbers are mentioned below.
Venue: Glenfield college theatre, 60 Kaipatiki Rd, Glenfield
Once again reminding you the date of the function will be 5th January 2019, and the venue - Takapuna War Memorial Hall and the time - 5 pm. MERRY CHRISTMAS & HAPPY NEW YEAR.

.
സ്നേഹത്തോടെ,
നോർത്ത് ഷോർ മലയാളി അസോസിയേഷൻ

Dear NSMA Members,
We cordially invite all of you and your families to the NSMA Arangu- Music and Dance Festival- 2018.

When: Saturday, the 21st Apr 2018
Venue: Glenfield college theatre, 60 Kaipatiki Rd, Glenfield
Let’s all celebrate together and make this event a grant success.
.
സ്നേഹത്തോടെ,
നോർത്ത് ഷോർ മലയാളി അസോസിയേഷൻ

With immense sorrow, we inform you the sad demise of Mrs Teena Kunjappan (29), a native of Kundara, Kollam. Teena is the tragic victim of an accidental drowning at Tahunanui Beach, Nelson, where she and her husband Mr. Jilu C John had gone for a stroll. She died at the scene before the arrival of the emergency services and Jilu was taken to Nelson Hospital in a moderate condition. We are looking forward for helping the family for the repatriation to India. Kindly, come forward for raising funds to help the family, Please use below link for ur contributions.

It is with sorror we inform you the sad demise of Mr V.V Cherian (87), Valiyaveetil, father of Siby cherian residing at 2/23 Brooke street Milford. He passed away in kerala and the funeral will be held on 8th -Jan-2018 at 10 am at kudamaloor church. Please put together all our prayers for the departed soul.

Dear NSMA Members,
We cordially invite all of you and your families to the NSMA Christmas and New Year celebrations 2018.

When: Saturday, the 13th January 2018
Venue: The Forrest Hill Primary School
Time: 6pm onwards

Kindly bring $1 coins to participate in variety of exciting games arranged just for you.

Entry requirements:
Adults: $20
Kids: $10 (age 5-15)
Guests: $25

Last date to buy your coupons will be on 10/01/2018.
Let’s all celebrate together and make this event a grant success.
For coupons, please contact :
Binu - 0223210823
Siby - 0211440581
Martin - 0272748931
Jose - 0220997757
Unni - 0211296136
Deepa - 0212127717
Shino - 02108241967
Vishal - 02102248998
Deepu - 0223440305
സ്നേഹത്തോടെ,
നോർത്ത് ഷോർ മലയാളി അസോസിയേഷൻ
